sense.def:
To reply to something
pomeni, da povemo ali napišemo odgovor na nekaj, kar nam reče ali napiše nekdo drug.

seg.quote: He gave me no chance to reply to his question.
‘Did you have a nice journey?’—‘Yes,’ Jenny replied.
I sent you a letter, and you never replied.

sense.def:
A reply
je tisto, kar rečemo ali napišemo, ko odgovarjamo komu.

seg.quote: He called ‘Sarah’, but there was no reply.
I received about a dozen replies to my enquiry.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj rečemo ali naredimo
in reply to what someone else has said or done
, se tako odzovemo na tisto, kar je rekel ali naredil nekdo drug.

seg.quote: I have nothing to say in reply to your question.
